label: Layout
name: layout
inline_help_text: Define the website global layout, responsive breakpoints and container widths here.

children.label: Spacing base
children.name: spacing_base
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the spacing base of the theme here.

children.label: Desktop
children.name: xl
children.inline_help_text: Define the website layout for desktop devices here.

children.label: Responsive breakpoint
children.name: breakpoint
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the breakpoint.

children.label: Container width
children.name: max_width
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the maximum content width.

children.label: Sections spacing
children.name: spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the default spacing that will be used on each section of your website (You can override this value directly in the page editor).

children.label: Columns gap
children.name: columns_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

children.label: Rows gap
children.name: rows_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

children.label: Tablet
children.name: md
children.inline_help_text: Define the website layout for tablet devices here.

children.label: Responsive breakpoint
children.name: breakpoint
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the breakpoint.

children.label: Container width
children.name: max_width
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the maximum content width.

children.label: Sections spacing
children.name: spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the default spacing that will be used on each section of your website (You can override this value directly in the page editor).

children.label: Columns gap
children.name: columns_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

children.label: Rows gap
children.name: rows_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

children.label: Mobile
children.name: xs
children.inline_help_text: Define the website layout for mobile devices here.

children.label: Responsive breakpoint
children.name: breakpoint
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the breakpoint.

children.label: Container width
children.name: max_width
children.inline_help_text: Use this option to set the maximum content width.

children.label: Sections spacing
children.name: spacing
children.inline_help_text: Set the default spacing that will be used on each section of your website (You can override this value directly in the page editor).

children.label: Columns gap
children.name: columns_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

children.label: Rows gap
children.name: rows_gap
children.inline_help_text: Set the column gap here. The column gap is the space visible between each column in the layout grid.

label: Colors
name: colors
inline_help_text: Set all the theme colors here. These colors will be used across all modules and templates using this theme.

children.label: First color
children.name: first
children.inline_help_text: Set the first color of the theme here.

children.label: Second color
children.name: second
children.inline_help_text: Set the second color of the theme here.

children.label: Third color
children.name: third
children.inline_help_text: Set the third color of the theme here.

children.label: Fourth color
children.name: fourth
children.inline_help_text: Set the fourth color of the theme here.

children.label: Fifth color
children.name: fifth
children.inline_help_text: Set the fifth color of the theme here.

children.label: Body (default) color
children.name: default
children.inline_help_text: Set the element color of the theme here. Body color is also used for default color values.

children.label: Black
children.name: black
children.inline_help_text: Set the black color of the theme here.

children.label: Gray
children.name: gray
children.inline_help_text: Set the gray color of the theme here.

children.label: White
children.name: white
children.inline_help_text: Set the white color of the theme here.

children.label: Second accent color
children.name: second_accent
children.inline_help_text: Set the second accent color of the theme here.

label: Fonts
name: fonts
inline_help_text: Set the main theme fonts here. These fonts will be used across all modules and templates using this theme by default, but you can make some exceptions in the typography settings.

children.label: Primary font
children.name: body_font
children.inline_help_text: Set the primary font here (Used by default on element).

children.label: Secondary font
children.name: titles_font
children.inline_help_text: Set the secondary font here (Used by default on element).

label: Typography
name: typography
inline_help_text: Set the element and headings font styles here. You can set a specific font size / line-height for each devices, set the default color and override the default font if needed.

children.label: Desktop
children.name: xl
children.inline_help_text: Define all font styles for desktop devices here.

children.label: Title Hero 1
children.name: title_hero_1
children.inline_help_text: Define all heading one styles here.

children.label: Font weight
children.name: font_weight
children.inline_help_text: You can set the font weight for this element here.

children.label: Bold font weight
children.name: bold_variation
children.inline_help_text: You can override the bold variant for this element here.

children.label: Color
children.name: color
children.inline_help_text: Set the element color here.

children.name: text_transform
children.inline_help_text: Select an option below to change the display on element.
